items.sentence: Tom wanted to go, but he had lots of things to do.
Tom wanted to prove to his friends he could do it.
Tom wants to live in the country after he retires.
Tom wants to spend the rest of his life with Mary.
Tom began to work for our company three years ago.
Tom believed he could actually predict the future.
Tom believed that nothing bad could happen to him.
Tom bought a cup of coffee from a vending machine.
Tom bought his daughter a new dress for the party.
I understand that you\'re a good friend of Tom\'s.
